   22: -module(ssh_sftp_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   38:          ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar/1,
   39:          async_read/1,
   40:          async_write/1,
   41:          big_file_to_tar/1,
   42:          binaries_to_tar/1,
   43:          block_size_16_crypto_tar/1,
   44:          block_size_1_crypto_tar/1,
   45:          create_empty_tar/1,
   46:          directory_to_tar/1,
   47:          file_owner_access/1,
   48:          files_chunked_to_tar/1,
   49:          files_to_tar/1,
   50:          links/1,
   51:          mk_rm_dir/1,
   52:          null_crypto_tar/1,
   53:          open_close_dir/1,
   54:          open_close_file/1,
   55:          pos_read/1,
   56:          pos_write/1,
   57:          position/1,
   58:          read_crypto_tar/1,
   59:          read_dir/1,
   60:          read_file/1,
   61:          read_null_crypto_tar/1,
   62:          read_tar/1,
   63:          remove_file/1,
   64:          rename_file/1,
   65:          retrieve_attributes/1,
   66:          set_attributes/1,
   67:          sftp_nonexistent_subsystem/1,
   68:          sftp_read_big_file/1,
   69:          simple_crypto_tar_big/1,
   70:          simple_crypto_tar_small/1,
   71:          start_channel_sock/1,
   72:          stuff/1,
   73:          unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar/1,
   74:          unstuff/1,
   75:          version_option/1,
   76:          write_big_file/1,
   77:          write_file/1,
   78:          write_file_iolist/1
   79:         ]).
   80: 
   81: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   82: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   83: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   84: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   85: %% Default timetrap timeout
   86: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   87: 
   88: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   89: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: 
   92: suite() ->
   93:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   94:      {timetrap,{seconds,40}}].
   95: 
   96: all() -> 
   97:     [{group, not_unicode},
   98:      {group, unicode}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: 
  102: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  103:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  104:        begin
  105: 	   ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  106: 		  [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  107: 	   ssh:start(),
  108: 	   Config
  109:        end).
  110: 
  111: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  112:     ssh:stop().
  113: 
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: groups() -> 
  116:     [{not_unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  117: 			{group,openssh_server},
  118: 			{group,big_recvpkt_size},
  119: 			sftp_nonexistent_subsystem]},
  120: 
  121:      {unicode, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  122: 		    {group,openssh_server},
  123: 		    sftp_nonexistent_subsystem
  124:                    ]},
  125: 
  126:      {big_recvpkt_size, [], [{group,erlang_server},
  127: 			     {group,openssh_server}]},
  128: 
  129:      {erlang_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  130: 			  version_option,
  131: 			  {group,remote_tar}]},
  132: 
  133:      {openssh_server, [], [{group,write_read_tests},
  134: 			   {group,remote_tar}]},
  135: 
  136:      {remote_tar, [], [create_empty_tar, 
  137: 		       ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  138: 		       ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar,
  139: 		       unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar,
  140: 		       files_to_tar,
  141: 		       big_file_to_tar, files_chunked_to_tar,
  142: 		       directory_to_tar, binaries_to_tar, null_crypto_tar, 
  143: 		       simple_crypto_tar_small, simple_crypto_tar_big,
  144: 		       read_tar, read_null_crypto_tar, read_crypto_tar, 
  145: 		       block_size_1_crypto_tar, block_size_16_crypto_tar
  146: 		      ]},
  147: 
  148:      {write_read_tests, [], [open_close_file, open_close_dir, read_file, read_dir,
  149: 			     write_file, write_file_iolist, write_big_file, sftp_read_big_file,
  150: 			     rename_file, mk_rm_dir, remove_file, links,
  151: 			     retrieve_attributes, set_attributes, file_owner_access, async_read,
  152: 			     async_write, position, pos_read, pos_write,
  153: 			     start_channel_sock
  154: 			    ]}
  155:     ].
  156: 
  157: init_per_group(not_unicode, Config) ->
  158:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  159:     {ok,TestDataDir} =
  160:         make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_not_unicode"),
  161:     [{user, "Alladin"},
  162:      {passwd, "Sesame"},
  163:      {data, <<"Hello world!">>},
  164:      {data_pos, ["Hej ","hopp"]},
  165:      {filename,     "sftp.txt"},
  166:      {testfile,     "test.txt"},
  167:      {linktest,     "link_test.txt"},
  168:      {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test.tar"},
  169:      {tar_F1_txt,   "f1.txt"},
  170:      {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  171:      | Config];
  172: 
  173: init_per_group(unicode, Config) ->
  174:     case have_unicode_support() of
  175: 	true ->
  176: 	    ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  177:             {ok,TestDataDir} =
  178:                 make_data_sub_dir(Config, "test_data", "test_data_高兴_unicöde"),
  179:             populate_non_unicode(TestDataDir),
  180: 	    NewConfig =
  181: 		[{user, "åke高兴"},
  182: 		 {passwd, "ärlig日本じん"},
  183:                  {data, "foobar å 一二三四いちにさんち"},
  184:                  {data_pos, ["中","国"]},
  185: 		 {filename,     "sftp瑞点.txt"},
  186: 		 {testfile,     "testハンス.txt"},
  187: 		 {linktest,     "link_test語.txt"},
  188: 		 {tar_filename, "sftp_tar_test一二三.tar"},
  189: 		 {tar_F1_txt,   "F一.txt"},
  190: 		 {tar_F3_txt,   "f3.txt"},
  191: 		 {tar_F4_txt,   "g四.txt"},
  192: 		 {datadir_tar, TestDataDir}
  193: 		 | Config %% lists:foldl(fun(K,Cf) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,Cf) end,
  194: 			  %%      Config,
  195: 			  %%      [user, passwd, data,
  196: 			  %%       filename, testfile, linktest,
  197: 			  %%       tar_filename, tar_F1_txt, datadir_tar
  198: 			  %%      ]
  199:                           %%     )
  200: 		],
  201: 	    FN = fn(proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt,NewConfig), NewConfig),
  202: 	    case catch file:read_file(FN) of
  203: 		{ok,FN_contents} ->
  204: 		    ct:log("Readable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~tp",[FN,FN_contents]),
  205: 		    NewConfig;
  206: 		Other ->
  207: 		    ct:log("Unreadable file:read_file(~tp) ->~n~p",[FN,Other]),
  208: 		    {skip, "Not unicode file reading"}
  209: 	    end;
  210: 
  211: 	_ ->
  212: 	    {skip, "Not unicode file encoding"}
  213:     end;
  214: 
  215: init_per_group(big_recvpkt_size, Config) ->
  216:     [{pkt_sz,123456} | Config];
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  219:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  220:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  221:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  222:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  223:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  224:     Sftpd = {_, HostX, PortX} =
  225: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  226: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  227: 			     {user_passwords,
  228: 			      [{User, Passwd}]}]),
  229:     [{peer, {fmt_host(HostX),PortX}}, {group, erlang_server}, {sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  230: 
  231: init_per_group(openssh_server, Config) ->
  232:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  233:     Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  234:     case (catch ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host,
  235: 				       [{user_interaction, false},
  236: 					{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  237:                                         {save_accepted_host, false}
  238:                                        ])) of
  239: 	{ok, _ChannelPid, Connection} ->
  240: 	    [{peer, {_HostName,{IPx,Portx}}}] = ssh:connection_info(Connection,[peer]),
  241: 	    ssh:close(Connection),
  242: 	    [{w2l, fun w2l/1},
  243:              {peer, {fmt_host(IPx),Portx}}, {group, openssh_server} | Config];
  244: 	{error,"Key exchange failed"} ->
  245: 	    {skip, "openssh server doesn't support the tested kex algorithm"};
  246: 	Other ->
  247:             ct:log("No openssh server. Cause:~n~p~n",[Other]),
  248: 	    {skip, "No openssh daemon (see log in testcase)"} 
  249:     end;
  250: 
  251: init_per_group(remote_tar, Config) ->
  252:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  253:     {Host,Port} =  proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  254:     ct:log("Server (~p) at ~p:~p",[proplists:get_value(group,Config),Host,Port]),
  255:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  256:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  257:     Connection =
  258: 	case proplists:get_value(group, Config) of
  259: 	    erlang_server ->
  260: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  261: 			    [{user, User},
  262: 			     {password, Passwd},
  263: 			     {user_interaction, false},
  264: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}]);
  265: 	    openssh_server ->
  266: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port,
  267: 			    [{user_interaction, false},
  268: 			     {silently_accept_hosts, true}])
  269: 	end,
  270:     [{remote_tar, true}, 
  271:      {connection, Connection} | Config];
  272: 
  273: init_per_group(write_read_tests, Config) ->
  274:     ct:comment("Begin ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  275:     Config.
  276: 
  277: grps(Config) ->
  278:     proplists:get_all_values(
  279:       name, 
  280:       lists:flatten([proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[]),
  281: 		     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])])).
  282: 
  283: end_per_group(erlang_server, Config) ->
  284:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  285:     Config;
  286: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  287:     ct:comment("End ~p",[grps(Config)]),
  288:     Config.
  289: 
  290: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  291: 
  292: init_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  293:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  294:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  295:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  296:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  297:     Sftpd = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  298: 				 {user_dir, PrivDir},
  299: 				 {subsystems, []},
  300: 				 {user_passwords,
  301: 				  [{User, Passwd}]}
  302: 				]),
  303:     [{sftpd, Sftpd} | Config];
  304: 
  305: init_per_testcase(version_option, Config0) ->
  306:     Config = prepare(Config0),
  307:     TmpConfig0 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config),
  308:     TmpConfig = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, TmpConfig0),
  309:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  310:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  311:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  312:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  313:     {ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  314: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  315: 			       [{sftp_vsn, 3},
  316: 				{user, User},
  317: 				{password, Passwd},
  318: 				{user_interaction, false},
  319: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  320:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  321:                                ]),
  322:     Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  323:     [{sftp,Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | TmpConfig];
  324: 
  325: init_per_testcase(Case, Config00) ->
  326:     Config0 = prepare(Config00),
  327:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  328:     Config2 = lists:keydelete(sftp, 1, Config1),
  329:     Dog = ct:timetrap(2 * ?default_timeout),
  330:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config0),
  331:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config0),
  332:     PktSzOpt = case proplists:get_value(pkt_sz, Config0) of
  333: 		   undefined -> [];
  334: 		   Sz -> [{packet_size,Sz}]
  335: 	       end,
  336:     Config =
  337: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config2) of
  338: 	    erlang_server ->
  339: 		{_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config2),
  340: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection}  = 
  341: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  342: 					   [{user, User},
  343: 					    {password, Passwd},
  344: 					    {user_interaction, false},
  345: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  346:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  347: 					    | PktSzOpt
  348: 					   ]
  349: 					  ),
  350: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  351: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2];
  352: 	    openssh_server when Case == links ->
  353: 		{skip, "known bug in openssh"};
  354: 	    openssh_server ->
  355: 		Host = ssh_test_lib:hostname(),
  356: 		{ok, ChannelPid, Connection} = 
  357: 		    ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, 
  358: 					   [{user_interaction, false},
  359: 					    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  360:                                             {save_accepted_host, false}
  361: 					    | PktSzOpt
  362: 					   ]),
  363: 		Sftp = {ChannelPid, Connection},
  364: 		[{sftp, Sftp}, {watchdog, Dog} | Config2]
  365: 	end,
  366: 
  367:     case catch proplists:get_value(remote_tar,Config) of
  368: 	%% The 'catch' is for the case of Config={skip,...}
  369: 	true ->
  370: 	    %% Provide a ChannelPid independent of the sftp-channel already opened.
  371: 	    {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(proplists:get_value(connection,Config)),
  372: 	    [{channel_pid2,ChPid2} | Config];
  373: 	_ ->
  374: 	    Config
  375:     end.
  376: 
  377: end_per_testcase(sftp_nonexistent_subsystem, Config) ->
  378:     Config;
  379: end_per_testcase(rename_file, Config) ->
  380:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  381:     file:delete(NewFileName),  
  382:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  383: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  384:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  385: 
  386: end_per_testcase(Config) ->
  387:     {Sftp, Connection} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  388:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Sftp),
  389:     catch ssh_sftp:stop_channel(proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config)),
  390:     ok = ssh:close(Connection).
  391: 
  392: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  393: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  394: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  395: open_close_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  396:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  397:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  398:     ct:log("FileName     = ~p~nSftpFileName = ~p", [FileName, SftpFileName]),
  399:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  400: 
  401:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  402:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  403:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, creat]),
  404:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write, trunc]),
  405:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [append]),
  406:     ok = open_close_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read, binary]).
  407: 
  408: open_close_file(Server, File, Mode) ->
  409:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Server, File, Mode),
  410:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Server, Handle).
  411: 
  412: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  413: open_close_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  414:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  415:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  416:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  417:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  418:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  419: 
  420:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  421:     ok = ssh_sftp:close(Sftp, Handle),
  422:     {error, _} =  ssh_sftp:opendir(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  423: 
  424: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  425: read_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  426:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  427:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  428:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  429:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  430:     {ok, Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  431:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(FileName).
  432: 
  433: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  434: read_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  435:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  436:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  437: 
  438:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  439:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  440:     ct:log("sftp list dir: ~p~n", [Files]).
  441: 
  442: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  443: write_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  444:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  445:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  446:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  447:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  448:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  449:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  450:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  451: 
  452: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  453: write_file_iolist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  455:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  456:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  457: 
  458:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  459:     DataB = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  460:     lists:foreach(
  461:       fun(D) ->
  462: 	      ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [D]),
  463: 	      Expected = try iolist_to_binary(D)
  464:                          catch _:_ -> unicode:characters_to_binary(D)
  465: 			 end,
  466: 	      {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName)
  467:       end,
  468:       [Data, [Data,Data], [[Data],[Data]], [[[Data]],[[[[Data]],Data]]],
  469:        [[[[Data]],Data],DataB],
  470:        [[[[Data]],Data],[[DataB],[[DataB]]]]
  471:       ]).
  472: 
  473: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  474: write_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  475:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  476:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  477:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  478: 
  479:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  480:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  481:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  482:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  483:     {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName).
  484: 
  485: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  486: sftp_read_big_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  487:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  488:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  489:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  490: 
  491:     Data = [lists:duplicate(750000,"a"),
  492:             proplists:get_value(data, Config)],
  493:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  494:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  495:     {ok, Expected} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  496: 
  497: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  498: remove_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  500:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  501:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  502:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  503:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  504: 
  505:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  506:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  507:     ok = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  508:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  509:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  510:     {error, no_such_file} = ssh_sftp:delete(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  511: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  512: rename_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  513:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  514:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  515:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  516:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  517:     NewFileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  518:     SftpNewFileName = w2l(Config, NewFileName),
  519: 
  520:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  521:     {ok, Files} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  522:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, Files]),
  523:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), Files),
  524:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), Files),
  525:     ok = ssh_sftp:rename(Sftp, SftpFileName, SftpNewFileName),
  526:     {ok, NewFiles} = ssh_sftp:list_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir),
  527:     ct:log("FileName: ~p, Files: ~p~n", [FileName, NewFiles]),
  528: 
  529:     false = lists:member(filename:basename(FileName), NewFiles),
  530:     true = lists:member(filename:basename(NewFileName), NewFiles).
  531: 
  532: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  533: mk_rm_dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  534:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(sftp_priv_dir, Config),
  535:     SftpPrivDir = w2l(Config, PrivDir),
  536:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  537: 
  538:     DirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "test"),
  539:     SftpDirName = w2l(Config, DirName),
  540:     ok = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  541:     ok = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpDirName),
  542:     NewDirName = filename:join(PrivDir, "foo/bar"),
  543:     SftpNewDirName = w2l(Config, NewDirName),
  544:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:make_dir(Sftp, SftpNewDirName),
  545:     {error, _} = ssh_sftp:del_dir(Sftp, SftpPrivDir).
  546: 
  547: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  548: links(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  549:     case os:type() of
  550: 	{win32, _} ->
  551: 	    {skip, "Links are not fully supported by windows"};
  552: 	_ ->
  553: 	    {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  554: 	    FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  555:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  556: 	    LinkFileName = proplists:get_value(linktest, Config),
  557:             SftpLinkFileName = w2l(Config, LinkFileName),
  558: 
  559: 	    ok = ssh_sftp:make_symlink(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName, SftpFileName),
  560: 	    {ok, FileName} = ssh_sftp:read_link(Sftp, SftpLinkFileName)
  561:     end.
  562: 
  563: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  564: retrieve_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  566:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  567:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  568:     {ok, FileInfo} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  569:     {ok, NewFileInfo} = file:read_file_info(FileName),
  570:     ct:log("ssh_sftp:read_file_info(~p): ~p~n"
  571:            "file:read_file_info(~p): ~p",
  572:            [SftpFileName, FileInfo, FileName, NewFileInfo]),
  573:     {ExpectedUid, ExpectedGid} =
  574:         case {os:type(), proplists:get_value(group,Config)} of
  575:             {{win32, _}, openssh_server} ->
  576:                 %% Windows compiled Erlang is expected will return 0;
  577:                 %% but when Erlang(Windows) client interacts with
  578:                 %% OpenSSH server - value 1000 is received by client
  579:                 %% over SFTP (because OpenSSH is compiled for Linux
  580:                 %% and runs on WSL)
  581:                 {1000, 1000};
  582:             _ ->
  583:                 {FileInfo#file_info.uid, FileInfo#file_info.gid}
  584:         end,
  585:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedUid, NewFileInfo#file_info.uid),
  586:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedGid, NewFileInfo#file_info.gid),
  587:     ok.
  588: 
  589: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  590: set_attributes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  591:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  592:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  593:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  594:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, write),
  595:     io:put_chars(Fd,"foo"),
  596:     TestWriting =
  597:         fun(FInfo) ->
  598:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  599:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#400}),
  600:                 {error, eacces} = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again"),
  601:                 ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName,
  602:                                               FInfo#file_info{mode=8#600}),
  603:                 ok = file:write_file(FileName, "hello again")
  604:         end,
  605:     TestWriting(#file_info{}),
  606:     IsErlangServer =
  607:         fun() ->
  608:                 TcGroupPath = proplists:get_value(tc_group_path, Config),
  609:                 {_, Path} = lists:unzip(lists:flatten(TcGroupPath)),
  610:                 lists:member(erlang_server, Path)
  611:         end,
  612:     case IsErlangServer() of
  613:         true ->
  614:             ct:log("Testing with writing a complete #file_info record"),
  615:             {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(SftpFileName),
  616:             TestWriting(FileInfo);
  617:         _ ->
  618:             %% with OpenSSH daemon started by other user above instruction end
  619:             %% up with permission denied
  620:             ok
  621:     end,
  622:     ok.
  623: 
  624: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  625: file_owner_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     case os:type() of
  627:         {win32, _} ->
  628:             {skip, "Not a relevant test on Windows"};
  629:         _ ->
  630:             FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  631:             SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  632:             {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  633: 
  634:             {ok, #file_info{mode = InitialMode}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, FileName),
  635: 
  636:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#000}),
  637:             {ok, #file_info{access = none}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  638: 
  639:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#400}),
  640:             {ok, #file_info{access = read}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  641: 
  642:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#200}),
  643:             {ok, #file_info{access = write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  644: 
  645:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=8#600}),
  646:             {ok, #file_info{access = read_write}} = ssh_sftp:read_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName),
  647: 
  648:             ok = ssh_sftp:write_file_info(Sftp, SftpFileName, #file_info{mode=InitialMode}),
  649: 
  650:             ok
  651:     end.
  652: 
  653: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  654: async_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  655:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  656: 
  657:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  658:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  659:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  660:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:aread(Sftp, Handle, 20),
  661: 
  662:     receive
  663: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok, Data}} ->
  664: 	    ct:log("Data: ~p~n", [Data]),
  665: 	    ok;
  666: 	Msg ->
  667: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  668:     after 
  669: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  670:     end.
  671: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  672: async_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  673:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  674:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  675:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  676:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  677:     Data = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  678:     Expected = unicode:characters_to_binary(Data),
  679:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:awrite(Sftp, Handle, Data),
  680: 
  681:     receive
  682: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  683: 	    {ok, Expected} = file:read_file(FileName);
  684: 	Msg ->
  685: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  686:     end.
  687: 
  688: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  689: position(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  691:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  692:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  693: 
  694:     Data = list_to_binary("1234567890"),
  695:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  696:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  697: 
  698:     {ok, 3} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 3}),
  699:     {ok, "4"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  700: 
  701:     {ok, 10} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, eof),
  702:     eof = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  703: 
  704:     {ok, 6} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 6}),
  705:     {ok, "7"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  706: 
  707:     {ok, 9} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, {cur, 2}),
  708:     {ok, "0"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  709: 
  710:     {ok, 0} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, bof),
  711:     {ok, "1"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1),
  712: 
  713:     {ok, 1} = ssh_sftp:position(Sftp, Handle, cur),
  714:     {ok, "2"} = ssh_sftp:read(Sftp, Handle, 1).
  715: 
  716: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  717: pos_read(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  718:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  719:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  720:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  721:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_pos, Config),
  722:     [Expect1,Expect2] = Es = [binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(D)) || D <- Data],
  723:     [Len1,Len2] = [length(E) || E <- Es],
  724:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, Data),
  725: 
  726:     {ok,Read} = file:read_file(FileName),
  727:     ct:log("File: <~ts>~n<~p>~nExpect1: <~p>~nExpect2: <~p>", [Read, Read, Expect1, Expect2]),
  728: 
  729:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [read]),
  730:     {async,Ref} = ssh_sftp:apread(Sftp, Handle, {bof, Len1}, Len2),
  731: 
  732:     receive
  733: 	{async_reply, Ref, {ok,Expect2}} ->
  734: 	    ok;
  735: 	Msg ->
  736: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  737:     after 
  738: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  739:     end,
  740: 
  741:    {ok,Expect1} = ssh_sftp:pread(Sftp, Handle, {bof,0}, Len1).
  742: 
  743: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  744: pos_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  745:     FileName = proplists:get_value(testfile, Config),
  746:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  747:     {Sftp, _} = proplists:get_value(sftp, Config),
  748: 
  749:     {ok, Handle} = ssh_sftp:open(Sftp, SftpFileName, [write]),
  750: 
  751:     Data = list_to_binary("Bye,"),
  752:     ok = ssh_sftp:write_file(Sftp, SftpFileName, [Data]),
  753: 
  754:     NewData = list_to_binary(" see you tomorrow"),
  755:     {async, Ref} = ssh_sftp:apwrite(Sftp, Handle, {bof, 4}, NewData),
  756:     receive
  757: 	{async_reply, Ref, ok} ->
  758: 	    ok;
  759: 	Msg ->
  760: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  761:     after 
  762: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  763:     end,
  764: 
  765:     LastData = proplists:get_value(data, Config),
  766:     ok = ssh_sftp:pwrite(Sftp, Handle, eof, LastData),
  767: 
  768:     NewData1 = unicode:characters_to_binary("Bye, see you tomorrow" ++ LastData),
  769:     {ok, NewData1} = ssh_sftp:read_file(Sftp, SftpFileName).
  770: 
  771: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  772: start_channel_sock(Config) ->
  773:     LoginOpts =
  774: 	case proplists:get_value(group,Config) of
  775: 	    erlang_server -> 
  776: 		[{user,     proplists:get_value(user, Config)},
  777: 		 {password, proplists:get_value(passwd, Config)}];
  778: 	    openssh_server ->
  779: 		[] % Use public key
  780: 	end,
  781: 
  782:     Opts = [{user_interaction, false},
  783: 	    {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  784:             {save_accepted_host, false}
  785: 	    | LoginOpts],
  786: 
  787:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(peer, Config),
  788: 
  789:     %% Get a tcp socket
  790:     {ok, Sock} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  791: 
  792:     %% and open one channel on one new Connection
  793:     {ok, ChPid1, Conn} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Sock, Opts),
  794:     
  795:     %% Test that the channel is usable
  796:     FileName = proplists:get_value(filename, Config),
  797:     SftpFileName = w2l(Config, FileName),
  798: 
  799:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  800:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [write]),
  801: 
  802:     %% Try to open a second channel on the Connection
  803:     {ok, ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  804:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid1, SftpFileName, [read]),
  805:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [read]),
  806: 
  807:     %% Test that the second channel still works after closing the first one
  808:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid1),
  809:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  810:     
  811:     %% Test the Connection survives that all channels are closed
  812:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid2),
  813:     {ok, ChPid3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Conn, Opts),
  814:     ok = open_close_file(ChPid3, SftpFileName, [write]),
  815:     
  816:     %% Test that a closed channel really is closed
  817:     {error, closed} = ssh_sftp:open(ChPid2, SftpFileName, [write]),
  818:     ok = ssh_sftp:stop_channel(ChPid3),
  819: 
  820:     %% Test that the socket is closed when the Connection closes
  821:     ok = ssh:close(Conn),
  822:     timer:sleep(400), %% Until the stop sequence is fixed
  823:     {error,_} = inet:getopts(Sock, [active]),
  824: 
  825:     ok.
  826: 
  827: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  828: sftp_nonexistent_subsystem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  829:     {_,Host, Port} =  proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config),
  830:     User = proplists:get_value(user, Config),
  831:     Passwd = proplists:get_value(passwd, Config),
  832:     {error,"server failed to start sftp subsystem"} =
  833: 	ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port,
  834: 			       [{user_interaction, false},
  835: 				{user, User},
  836: 				{password, Passwd},
  837: 				{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  838:                                 {save_accepted_host, false}
  839:                                ]).
  840: 
  841: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  842: version_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  843:     open_close_dir(Config).
  844: 
  845: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  846: create_empty_tar(Config) ->
  847:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  848:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  849:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  850:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  851:     erl_tar:close(Handle),
  852:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
  853:     {ok, #file_info{type=regular}} =
  854: 	ssh_sftp:read_file_info(ChPid, SftpTarFileName).
  855: 
  856: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  857: files_to_tar(Config) ->
  858:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  859:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  860:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  861:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  862:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  863:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose]),
  864:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  865:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  866:     chk_tar([F1, "f2.txt"], Config).
  867: 
  868: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  869: ascii_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  870:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  871:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  872:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  873:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  874:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("f2.txt",Config), "f2.txt", [verbose]),
  875:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  876:     chk_tar(["f2.txt"], Config).
  877: 
  878: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  879: ascii_filename_unicode_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  880:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F3_txt, Config) of
  881: 	undefined ->
  882: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  883: 	Fn ->
  884: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  885: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  886:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  887: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  888: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  889: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  890: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  891:     end.
  892: 
  893: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  894: unicode_filename_ascii_contents_to_tar(Config) ->
  895:     case proplists:get_value(tar_F4_txt, Config) of
  896: 	undefined ->
  897: 	    {skip, "Unicode test"};
  898: 	Fn ->
  899: 	    ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  900: 	    TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  901:             SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  902: 	    {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  903: 	    ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(Fn,Config), Fn, [verbose]),
  904: 	    ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  905: 	    chk_tar([Fn], Config)
  906:     end.
  907: 
  908: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  909: big_file_to_tar(Config) ->
  910:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  911:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  912:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  913:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]), 
  914:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose]),
  915:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  916:     chk_tar(["big.txt"], Config).
  917: 
  918: 
  919: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  920: files_chunked_to_tar(Config) ->
  921:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  922:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  923:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  924:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  925:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  926:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  927:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  928:     chk_tar([F1], Config).
  929: 
  930: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  931: directory_to_tar(Config) ->
  932:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  933:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  934:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  935:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  936:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("d1",Config), "d1", [verbose]),
  937:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  938:     chk_tar(["d1"], Config).
  939: 
  940: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  941: binaries_to_tar(Config) ->
  942:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  943:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  944:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  945:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
  946:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  947:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  948:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  949:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}], Config).
  950: 
  951: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  952: null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
  953:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  954:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
  955:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  956:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
  957:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  958:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  959:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  960:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  961:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  962:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  963:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  964:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  965:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
  966:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  967:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config).
  968: 
  969: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  970: simple_crypto_tar_small(Config) ->
  971:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  972:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _Size=6} end,
  973:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  974:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_Size=4} end,
  975:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  976:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  977:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  978:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  979:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  980:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  981:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
  982:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
  983:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
  984:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
  985:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
  986: 
  987: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  988: simple_crypto_tar_big(Config) ->
  989:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
  990:     Cinit = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=6} end,
  991:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=5} end,
  992:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=4} end,
  993:     Cend = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
  994:     C = {Cinit,Cenc,Cend},
  995:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
  996:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
  997:     {ok,Handle} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,C}]),
  998:     Bin = <<"A binary">>,
  999:     F1 = proplists:get_value(tar_F1_txt, Config),
 1000:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, Bin, "b1", [verbose]),
 1001:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn(F1,Config), F1, [verbose,{chunks,2}]),
 1002:     ok = erl_tar:add(Handle, fn("big.txt",Config), "big.txt", [verbose,{chunks,15000}]),
 1003:     ok = erl_tar:close(Handle),
 1004:     chk_tar([{"b1",Bin}, F1, "big.txt"], Config, [{crypto,{Cinit,Cdec}}]).
 1005: 
 1006: stuff(Bin) -> << <<C,C>> || <<C>> <= Bin >>.
 1007: 
 1008: unstuff(Bin) -> << <<C>> || <<C,C>> <= Bin >>.
 1009: 
 1010: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1011: read_tar(Config) ->
 1012:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1013:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1014: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1015: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1016: 		 ]),
 1017:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1018:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1019:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write]),
 1020:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1021:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1022:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1023: 
 1024:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config).
 1025: 
 1026: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1027: read_null_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1028:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1029:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1030: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1031: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1032: 		 ]),
 1033:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1034:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1035:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1036:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,Bin,CState,_FetchSize=19} end,
 1037:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,Bin} end,
 1038:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1039:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1040: 
 1041:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1042:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1043:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1044:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1045:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1046:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1047: 
 1048:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1049: 
 1050: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1051: read_crypto_tar(Config) ->
 1052:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1053:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1054: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1055: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))}
 1056: 		 ]),
 1057:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _SendSize=5} end,
 1058:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, no_state, _FetchSize=42} end,
 1059: 
 1060:     Cenc = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin),CState,_SendSize=42*42} end,
 1061:     Cdec = fun(Bin,CState) -> {ok,unstuff(Bin),CState,_FetchSize=120} end,
 1062:     Cendw = fun(Bin,_CState) -> {ok,stuff(Bin)} end,
 1063:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1064:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1065: 
 1066:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1067:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1068:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1069:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose])
 1070:      ||	{Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1071:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1072: 
 1073:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1074: 
 1075: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1076: block_size_16_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_cbc, Config).
 1077: block_size_1_crypto_tar(Config) -> cipher_crypto_tar(aes_256_ctr, Config).
 1078: 
 1079: cipher_crypto_tar(Cipher, Config) ->
 1080:     ChPid2 = proplists:get_value(channel_pid2, Config),
 1081:     NameBins = lists:sort(
 1082: 		 [{"b1",<<"A binary">>},
 1083: 		  {"b2",list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(750000,"a"))},
 1084: 		  {"d1",fn("d1",Config)}  % Dir
 1085: 		 ]),
 1086:     Key = <<"This is a 256 bit key. Boring...">>,
 1087:     Ivec0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(16),
 1088: 
 1089:     Cinitw = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,[{encrypt,true},
 1090:                                                                 {padding,zero}])} end,
 1091:     Cinitr = fun() -> {ok, crypto:crypto_init(Cipher,Key,Ivec0,false)} end,
 1092: 
 1093:     Cenc = fun(PlainBin,State) -> 
 1094: 		   CipherBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1095: 		   {ok, CipherBin, State}
 1096: 	   end,
 1097:     Cdec = fun(CipherBin,State) ->
 1098: 		   PlainBin = crypto:crypto_update(State, CipherBin),
 1099: 		   {ok, PlainBin, State}
 1100: 	   end,
 1101: 
 1102:     Cendw = fun(PlainBin, State) ->
 1103:                     CipherBin1 = crypto:crypto_update(State, PlainBin),
 1104:                     Sz1 = size(CipherBin1),
 1105: 		    CipherBin2 = crypto:crypto_final(State),
 1106:                     Sz2 = size(CipherBin2),
 1107: 		    {ok, <<CipherBin1:Sz1/binary, CipherBin2:Sz2/binary>>}
 1108: 	    end,
 1109: 
 1110:     Cw = {Cinitw,Cenc,Cendw},
 1111:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1112:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1113: 
 1114:     {ok,HandleWrite} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid2, SftpTarFileName, [write,{crypto,Cw}]),
 1115:     [ok = erl_tar:add(HandleWrite, Bin, Name, [verbose]) || {Name,Bin} <- NameBins],
 1116:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleWrite),
 1117: 
 1118:     Cr = {Cinitr,Cdec},
 1119:     chk_tar(NameBins, Config, [{crypto,Cr}]).
 1120: 
 1121: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1122: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1123: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1124: have_unicode_support() -> (file:native_name_encoding() == utf8) andalso ("四" == [22235]).
 1125: 
 1126: 
 1127: make_data_sub_dir(Config, SubDirSrc, SubDirDst) ->
 1128:     SrcDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1129:                            SubDirSrc
 1130:                           ),
 1131:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1132:                            SubDirDst),
 1133:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1134:     {ok,DstDir}.
 1135:     
 1136: 
 1137: prepare(Config0) ->
 1138:     SrcDir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar,Config0),
 1139:     DstDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config0), ssh_test_lib:random_chars(10)),
 1140:     ssh_test_lib:copy_recursive(SrcDir, DstDir),
 1141:     Keys = [filename,
 1142: 	    testfile,
 1143: 	    linktest,
 1144: 	    tar_filename],
 1145:     Config1 = foldl_keydelete(Keys, Config0),
 1146:     Config2 = lists:foldl(fun({Key,Name}, ConfAcc) ->
 1147:                                   [{Key, filename:join(DstDir,Name)} | ConfAcc]
 1148: 			  end,
 1149: 			  Config1,
 1150:                           lists:zip(Keys, [proplists:get_value(K,Config0) || K<-Keys])),
 1151: 
 1152:     catch ct:log("~p:~p Prepared filenames (Key -> Value):~n~ts",
 1153:                  [?MODULE,?LINE,
 1154:                   [io_lib:format("~p -> ~ts~n", [K,V]) || {K,V} <- Config2,
 1155:                                                           lists:member(K, Keys)]]),
 1156: 
 1157:     DataDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config2),
 1158:     FilenameSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "sftp.txt"),
 1159:     FilenameDst = proplists:get_value(filename, Config2),
 1160:     {ok,_} = file:copy(FilenameSrc, FilenameDst),
 1161:     [{sftp_priv_dir,DstDir} | Config2].
 1162: 
 1163: 
 1164: foldl_keydelete(Keys, L) ->
 1165:     lists:foldl(fun(K,E) -> lists:keydelete(K,1,E) end, 
 1166: 		L,
 1167: 		Keys).
 1168: 
 1169: 
 1170: chk_tar(Items, Config) ->
 1171:     chk_tar(Items, Config, []).
 1172: 
 1173: chk_tar(Items, Config, Opts) ->
 1174:     TarFileName = proplists:get_value(tar_filename, Config),
 1175:     chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts).
 1176: 
 1177: chk_tar(Items, TarFileName, Config, Opts)  when is_list(Opts) ->
 1178:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1179:     tar_size(TarFileName, Config),
 1180:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1181:     {ok,HandleRead} = ssh_sftp:open_tar(ChPid, SftpTarFileName, [read|Opts]),
 1182:     {ok,NameValueList} = erl_tar:extract(HandleRead,[memory,verbose]),
 1183:     ok = erl_tar:close(HandleRead),
 1184:     case {lists:sort(expand_items(Items,Config)), lists:sort(NameValueList)} of
 1185: 	{L,L} -> 
 1186: 	    true;
 1187: 	{Expect,Actual} -> 
 1188: 	    ct:log("Expect: ~p",[Expect]), ct:log("Actual: ~p",[Actual]),
 1189: 	    case erl_tar:table(TarFileName) of
 1190: 		{ok,Names} -> ct:log("names: ~p",[Names]);
 1191: 		Other -> ct:log("~p",[Other])
 1192: 	    end,
 1193: 	    ct:log("~s",[analyze_report(Expect, Actual)]),
 1194: 	    ct:fail(bad_tar_contents)
 1195:     end.
 1196: 
 1197: analyze_report([E={NameE,BinE}|Es], [A={NameA,BinA}|As]) ->
 1198:     if
 1199: 	NameE == NameA,
 1200: 	BinE =/= BinA-> 
 1201: 	    [["Component ",NameE," differs. \n  Expected: ",BinE,"\n  Actual: ",BinA,"\n\n"]
 1202: 	     | analyze_report(Es,As)];
 1203: 
 1204: 	NameE < NameA ->
 1205: 	    [["Component ",NameE," is missing.\n\n"]
 1206: 	     | analyze_report(Es,[A|As])];
 1207: 
 1208: 	NameE > NameA ->
 1209: 	    [["Component ",NameA," is not expected.\n\n"]
 1210: 	     | analyze_report([E|Es],As)];
 1211: 	true ->
 1212: 	    analyze_report(Es, As)
 1213:     end;
 1214: analyze_report([{NameE,_BinE}|Es], []) ->
 1215:     [["Component ",NameE," missing.\n\n"] | analyze_report(Es,[])];
 1216: analyze_report([], [{NameA,_BinA}|As]) ->
 1217:     [["Component ",NameA," not expected.\n\n"] | analyze_report([],As)];
 1218: analyze_report([], []) ->
 1219:     "".
 1220: 
 1221: tar_size(TarFileName, Config) ->
 1222:     SftpTarFileName = w2l(Config, TarFileName),
 1223:     {ChPid,_} = proplists:get_value(sftp,Config),
 1224:     {ok,Data} = ssh_sftp:read_file(ChPid, SftpTarFileName),
 1225:     io:format('Tar file ~p is~n ~p bytes.~n',[TarFileName, size(Data)]).
 1226: 
 1227: expand_items(Items, Config) ->    
 1228:     lists:flatten(
 1229:       [case Item of
 1230: 	   {_Name,Bin} when is_binary(Bin) -> 
 1231: 	       Item;
 1232: 	   {Name,FileName} when is_list(FileName) ->
 1233: 	       read_item_contents(Name, fn(FileName,Config));
 1234: 	   FileName  when is_list(FileName) ->
 1235: 	       read_item_contents(FileName, fn(FileName,Config))
 1236:        end || Item <- Items]).
 1237: 
 1238: read_item_contents(ItemName, FileName) ->
 1239:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 1240: 	{ok,Bin} ->
 1241: 	    {ItemName, Bin};
 1242: 	{error,eisdir} ->
 1243: 	    {ok,FileNames} = file:list_dir(FileName),
 1244: 	    [read_item_contents(filename:join(ItemName,Name),
 1245: 				filename:join(FileName,Name)) 
 1246: 	     || Name<-FileNames]
 1247:     end.
 1248: 
 1249: fn(Name, Config) ->
 1250:     Dir = proplists:get_value(datadir_tar, Config),
 1251:     filename:join(Dir,Name).
 1252: 
 1253: fmt_host({A,B,C,D}) -> lists:concat([A,".",B,".",C,".",D]);
 1254: fmt_host(S) -> S.
 1255: 
 1256: 
 1257: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1258: populate_non_unicode(Dir) ->
 1259:     file:delete("f1.txt"),
 1260:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"f3.txt"),
 1261:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1262:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"F一.txt"),
 1263:                          unicode:characters_to_binary("你好")),
 1264:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir,"g四.txt"),
 1265:                          <<"How are you?">>).
 1266: 
 1267: w2l(P) ->
 1268:     ssh_test_lib:winpath_to_linuxpath(P).
 1269: 
 1270: w2l(Config, P) ->
 1271:     W2L = proplists:get_value(w2l, Config, fun(X) -> X end),
 1272:     W2L(P).
 1273: 
 1274:
